array.string: launchctl setenv JOKER_RELEASE_PATH $HOME/Dropbox/Soft/Joker launchctl setenv TESTS_RELEASE_PATH $HOME/Dropbox/Soft/Joker/test launchctl setenv FFMPEG_DEV_PATH $HOME/dev/lib/ffmpeg/ffmpeg-4.2.2-macos64-dev launchctl setenv FFMPEG_SHARED_PATH $HOME/dev/lib/ffmpeg/ffmpeg-4.2.2-macos64-shared launchctl setenv AAF_PATH $HOME/dev/phonations/aaf/out launchctl setenv LTC_PATH /usr/local/opt/libltc
